tool.name: STAR-Fusion
tool.description: detect fusion genes in RNA-Seq data
tool.command:
## Create temporary index for custom reference #if str($refGenomeSource.genomeSource) == 'history': mkdir -p tempstargenomedir; STAR --runMode genomeGenerate --genomeDir "tempstargenomedir" --genomeFastaFiles "$refGenomeSource.ownFile" --runThreadN \${GALAXY_SLOTS:-4}
#if str($refGenomeSource.geneModel) != 'None': --sjdbOverhang "100" --sjdbGTFfile "$refGenomeSource.geneModel"
#if str($refGenomeSource.geneModel.ext) == 'gff3': --sjdbGTFtagExonParentTranscript Parent #end if #end if ; #end if
STAR-Fusion --chimeric_junction $chimeric_junction #if str($refGenomeSource.genomeSource) == 'history': --genome_lib_dir "tempstargenomedir" #else --genome_lib_dir "$refGenomeSource.index.fields.path" #end if
#if str($params.settingsType) == "full": --min_junction_reads $params.min_junction_reads --min_sum_frags $params.min_sum_frags --max_promiscuity $params.max_promiscuity --min_novel_junction_support $params.min_novel_junction_support --min_alt_pct_junction $params.min_alt_pct_junction --aggregate_novel_junction_dist $params.aggregate_novel_junction_dist --E $params.E #end if

param.name: chimeric_junction
param.label: Chimeric junction file from STAR (with STAR-Fusion settings)

param.name: genomeSource
param.label: Custom or built-in reference genome
param.help: Built-ins were indexed using default options
param.option: Index and use a genome fasta and GTF file from history

validator.message: No indexes are available for the selected input dataset

param.name: geneModel
param.label: Gene model (gff3,gtf) file for splice junctions. Leave blank for none
param.help: Optional. If supplied, the index file will retain exon junction information for mapping splices

param.name: settingsType
param.label: Settings to use
param.help: You can use the default settings or set custom values for any STAR Fusion parameter.

param.name: min_junction_reads
param.label: minimum number of junction-spanning reads required.

param.name: max_promiscuity
param.label: maximum number of partners allowed for a given fusion

param.name: min_novel_junction_support
param.label: minimum of 3 junction reads required if breakpoint lacks involvement of only reference junctions

param.name: min_alt_pct_junction
param.label: 10% of the dominant isoform junction support

param.name: aggregate_novel_junction_dist
param.label: non-ref junctions within 5 are merged into single calls
